# NSPreviewRepresentableActivityItem

**Protocol**

An interface you adopt in custom objects that you want to share using the macOS share sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSPreviewRepresentableActivityItem : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Adopt the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPreviewRepresentableActivityItem] interface in custom types your app makes available for sharing. Use this protocol to specify the item itself and a title and image the share sheet can use to create a preview for your item. To share the item from your app, initialize the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServicePicker] object with the object that adopts this protocol.



## Providing the Item to Share

- **item**: The app-specific item you want to share.

## Providing Metadata About the Item

- **title**: A localized string that contains the name of the item.
- **imageProvider**: An object that provides a visual representation of the item.
- **iconProvider**: An object that provides an icon that represents the item’s source.

## App Services

- **NSSharingService**: An object that facilitates the sharing of content with social media services, or with apps like Mail or Safari.
- **NSSharingServicePicker**: A list of sharing services that the user can choose from.
- **NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItem**: A toolbar item that displays the macOS share sheet.
- **NSServicesMenuRequestor**: A set of methods that support interaction with items users can share through a sharing service.
- **NSCloudSharingServiceDelegate**: A set of methods for responding to the life cycle events of the cloud-sharing service.
- **Services Functions**: Configure the contents of your app’s Services menu.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- NSPreviewRepresentingActivityItem
